LanguageData.ARA_DummyAmmo.label: Ammunition
LanguageData.ARA_DummyAmmo.description: Ammunition used by the Arachnae Swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_Filth_SpentAcid.label: Arachnae Spent Acid
LanguageData.ARA_Turret_Siphon.label: Siphon Turret
LanguageData.ARA_Turret_Siphon.description: A defensive turret hatched and built by an Arachnae Artisan. It automatically fires siphoning projectiles at distant enemies, which extract biomass from the enemy upon impact.
LanguageData.ARA_Turret_Heavy.label: Heavy Defense Turret
LanguageData.ARA_Turret_Heavy.description: A defensive turret hatched and built by an Arachnae Artisan. It automatically fires high-damage projectiles at distant enemies, capable of effectively defending against heavy foes.
LanguageData.ARA_Turret_CatastropheMissile.label: Catastrophe Acid-Burn Missile Launcher
LanguageData.ARA_Turret_CatastropheMissile.descriptio: An ultra-long-range defensive structure hatched and built by an Arachnae Artisan. It searches for incoming enemies at long range and fires Catastrophe Missiles at them. These missiles explode over the enemies' heads, releasing large amounts of corrosive acid that damages all enemies in the area.
LanguageData.ARA_Proj_Siphon.label: Siphon Projectile
LanguageData.ARA_Proj_Heavy.label: Heavy Defense Projectile
LanguageData.ARA_Proj_CatastropheMissile_Fake.label: Catastrophe Acid-Burn Missile
